name: First promotional CONTEST!!!!
description: Soon I will be having a contest, and you could enter to win one Lip Smacker Girl Scout Cookie set, one Maybelline Baby Lips lip balm, one L.A. Colors Glossy Lips, a totally cool journal including sketches of a few of your favorite outfits by M+R, and two issues of your choice from Teen Vogue, American Girl Magazine or Catalogue, or Girls Life Magazine! Enter to win this cool prize, plus a SUPER SURPRISE signed by both Raina and I! Rules to enter: Like us on Polyvore with a message that includes a link to your Facebook or Twitter, like us on Facebook, and then message us on Facebook telling us why you think you should win!!!! *Prices of prizes: Lip Smacker-$5, Baby Lips-$4, L.A. colors Gloss-$1, Journal-$1.99, and Magazine(estimated amount of most magazines)-$1.99-$5* Hope our winner enjoys her prize! Good Luck!
